prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Pipe, Drums, Guitar, Piano, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the Pipe, Drums, Guitar, and Piano, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of the Pipe, Drums, Guitar, and Piano, omitting the Bass.

Style 3:
The Pipe, Drums, Guitar, and Piano are all present in this song, but the Bass is absent.
